item.title: U.S. warplanes strike three Iranian nuclear sites in sweeping attack
item.description: The bombing is a major escalation by President Donald Trump, tethering the United States to a conflict with no clear end in sight.

item.title: After Virginia elections, governor’s race begins a new phase

item.title: Trump undermines Watergate laws in massive shift of ethics system
item.description: Congress built a system 50 years ago to prevent another Nixon. Trump seems determined to dismantle those rules.

item.title: Trump, Vance attending fundraisers on opposite sides of the country
